Get NFL standings for a specific season from ESPN's API

Source: R/get_nfl_standings.R
get_nfl_standings.Rd

Get NFL standings for a specific season from ESPN's API

get_nfl_standings(season = 2019, quiet = FALSE)

Arguments

season

Either numeric or character

Value

Returns a tibble

Examples

# Get standings from 2018 season
get_nfl_standings(season = "2018")

#> Returning 2018
#> # A tibble: 32 × 28
#>    conf  season team_id team_location team_name team_abb team_full  team_logo   
#>    <chr>  <int> <chr>   <chr>         <chr>     <chr>    <chr>      <chr>

#>  2 AFC     2018 12      Kansas City   Chiefs    KC       Kansas Ci… https://a.e…
#>  3 AFC     2018 34      Houston       Texans    HOU      Houston T… https://a.e…
#>  4 AFC     2018 17      New England   Patriots  NE       New Engla… https://a.e…
#>  5 AFC     2018 33      Baltimore     Ravens    BAL      Baltimore… https://a.e…
#>  6 AFC     2018 11      Indianapolis  Colts     IND      Indianapo… https://a.e…
#>  7 AFC     2018 23      Pittsburgh    Steelers  PIT      Pittsburg… https://a.e…
#>  8 AFC     2018 10      Tennessee     Titans    TEN      Tennessee… https://a.e…
#>  9 AFC     2018 5       Cleveland     Browns    CLE      Cleveland… https://a.e…
#> 10 AFC     2018 15      Miami         Dolphins  MIA      Miami Dol… https://a.e…
#> # … with 22 more rows, and 20 more variables: seed <int>, wins <dbl>,
#> #   losses <dbl>, win_pct <dbl>, g_behind <dbl>, ties <dbl>, pts_for <dbl>,
#> #   pts_against <dbl>, pts_diff <dbl>, streak <dbl>, div_ties <dbl>,
#> #   record <chr>, home_wins <dbl>, home_losses <dbl>, away_wins <dbl>,
#> #   away_losses <dbl>, conf_wins <dbl>, conf_losses <dbl>, div_wins <dbl>,
#> #   div_losses <dbl>

# Get standings from 2010 season
get_nfl_standings(2010)
